charts.title: Some random counters
charts.description: These counters can be set by members through SPARQL queries. These counters can be set by members through SPARQL queries. These counters can be set by members through SPARQL queries.

counters.query: PREFIX dbpedia: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?entity) as ?count) WHERE { ?entity a ?class . }
counters.title: Entities

counters.query: PREFIX dbpedia: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?creation) as ?count) WHERE { ?creation a <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/E65_Creation> . }
counters.title: Creations

counters.query: PREFIX dbpedia: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT (COUNT(DISTINCT ?person) as ?count) WHERE { ?person a <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/E21_Person> . }
counters.title: Creators

charts.title: A random bar-chart
charts.description: This a random bar-chart to show how bar-charts look like
charts.query:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT ?authorName (COUNT(DISTINCT ?painting) AS ?numPaintings) 
WHERE { ?painting a <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/E65_Creation> . 
?painting <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/P14_carried_out_by> ?author . 
?author a <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/E21_Person> .
?author rdfs:label ?authorLabel . 
BIND(STR(?authorLabel) AS ?authorName) 
} 
GROUP BY ?authorName 
ORDER BY ?authorName

charts.title: A random sorted bar-chart
charts.description: This a random bar-chart to show how sorted bar-charts look like
charts.query:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT ?authorName (COUNT(DISTINCT ?painting) AS ?numPaintings) 
WHERE { ?painting a <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/E65_Creation> . 
?painting <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/P14_carried_out_by> ?author . 
?author a <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/E21_Person> .
?author rdfs:label ?authorLabel . 
BIND(STR(?authorLabel) AS ?authorName) 
} 
GROUP BY ?authorName 
ORDER BY ?authorName

charts.title: A random sorted bar-chart
charts.description: This a random bar-chart to show how y-sorted bar-charts look like
charts.query:
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
SELECT ?authorName (COUNT(DISTINCT ?painting) AS ?numPaintings) 
WHERE { ?painting a <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/E65_Creation> . 
?painting <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/P14_carried_out_by> ?author . 
?author a <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/E21_Person> .
?author rdfs:label ?authorLabel . 
BIND(STR(?authorLabel) AS ?authorName) 
} 
GROUP BY ?authorName 
ORDER BY ?authorName
